cookie_notice.content_html: We use cookies (and similar techniques) on our site to improve the experience for you, enabling you to benefit from social sharing functionality (for Facebook, Instagram, etc.) and to tailor messages that are relevant to you (on our site, and others). They also help us understand how our site is being used. Read our Cookie Notice for more information. By clicking "Accept" you consent to our use of cookies

checkout_note.remind_otp_code_receiver_html: Note: You will receive OTP code by text message (SMS) to securely purchase with 2C2P.

checkout_condition.condition11_html: Your personal data, including but not limited to the personal data obtained from you directly when you provide us with personal information, e.g. when you register for our contests, vouchers and/or roadshows, use our website, buy a product or service from us, sign up to receive information, use our applications, fill out a survey, or make a comment or enquiry, and/or any further updates provided to us by you in relation to your personal information, photos, image, audio and/or video recording obtained by us (“Personal Data”), will be processed for any advertising, marketing, market research, publicity purpose(s) or any related purpose, your participation in our contest and/or roadshow and/or events, to provide you with products or services that you request from us, to provide you with advance notice of our future events,
checkout_condition.condition12_html: to respond to your inquiries, to provide you information about our products, services and/or new releases which may be of interest to you, to invite you and your subscription to our newsletters, and/or for auditing purposes in cases where there has been a dispute (collectively, “Purpose”). We will keep your personal data for as long as we need it for the purpose it is being processed for. We also wish to inform you that your Personal Data may be disclosed to third parties, such as to our headquarters, regional offices, subsidiaries, affiliates and/or members within the Unilever group of companies and Unilever Brands (Please visit Our Brands) and/or our service providers, distributors and third-party suppliers, which may be located outside Thailand, for reasons relating to the Purpose.
checkout_condition.condition13_html: You agree and accept that the transfer of your personal data outside Thailand to jurisdictions that may not protect your Personal data to the standards under PDPA. And acknowledge that Unilever will take appropriate steps to ensure the adequate level of protection for my Personal Data in other jurisdictions outside Thailand.
checkout_condition.condition14_html: You are entitled at any time, to access to and/or obtain a copy, request the transfer to other parties, object to the processing, destruction or anonymization, restriction of use, update your Personal Data, withdraw your consent or to file a complaint If any breach occurred or any violation of the PDPA, please contact: Data Privacy Officer, Unilever Thailand, Unilever House Building 161 Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310 or Thailand Customer service at Tel.+{{ contact_phone }} or email to {{contact_email}}.
checkout_condition.condition15_html: Kindly note that it will be necessary for us to process your Personal Data, without which we will not be able to carry out the Purpose. For more details on how we process your Personal Data, do visit our Privacy Notice
checkout_condition.condition21_html: I am 18 years old and above, have read and understood the terms of the Privacy Notice and consent to the processing of my Personal Data as described above.

find_representative.description: Find a representative to receive a promo code and get a 25% discount on all products or to receive a representative's code for business partner registration. You can find a representative nearby by filling out your address or find your preferred representative by filling out his or her name.

general.page_title: Request sample products or discount coupons
general.description: If you are a non-member and want to experience our products, tell us ! We'll send our sample products or discount coupon to you.
general.content_description_1_html: Personally experience the premium product from ULife. We deliver our exclusive product sampling to you at your doorstep!
general.content_description_2_html: Exclusive offers to non-members! Get discount coupon to buy the listed product.
general.content_title_3_html:
How to request sample
product or coupon?
general.content_description_3_html:
1. You’re a non-member
2. Verify your identity via LINE before requesting any sample products and coupons.

form.term_condition_11_html: Your personal data, including but not limited to the personal data obtained from you directly when you provide us with personal information, e.g. when you register for our contests, vouchers and/or roadshows, use our website, buy a product or service from us, sign up to receive information, use our applications, fill out a survey, or make a comment or enquiry, and/or any further updates provided to us by you in relation to your personal information, photos, image, audio and/or video recording obtained by us (“Personal Data”), will be processed for any advertising, marketing, market research, publicity purpose(s) or any related purpose, your participation in our contest and/or roadshow and/or events, to provide you with products or services that you request from us, to provide you with advance notice of our future events, to respond to your inquiries, to provide you information about our products, services and/or new releases which may be of interest to you, to invite you and your
form.term_condition_12_html: subscription to our newsletters, and/or for auditing purposes in cases where there has been a dispute (collectively, “Purpose”). We will keep your personal data for as long as we need it for the purpose it is being processed for. We also wish to inform you that your Personal Data may be disclosed to third parties, such as to our headquarters, regional offices, subsidiaries, affiliates and/or members within the Unilever group of companies and Unilever Brands (Please visit Our Brands) and/or our service providers, distributors and third-party suppliers, which may be located outside Thailand, for reasons relating to the Purpose.
form.term_condition_13_html: You agree and accept that the transfer of your personal data outside Thailand to jurisdictions that may not protect your Personal data to the standards under PDPA. And acknowledge that Unilever will take appropriate steps to ensure the adequate level of protection for my Personal Data in other jurisdictions outside Thailand.
form.term_condition_14_html: You are entitled at any time, to access to and/or obtain a copy, request the transfer to other parties, object to the processing, destruction or anonymization, restriction of use, update your Personal Data, withdraw your consent or to file a complaint If any breach occurred or any violation of the PDPA, please contact: Data Privacy Officer, Unilever Thailand, Unilever House Building 161 Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310 or Thailand Customer service at Tel. {phone} or email to {email}.
form.term_condition_15_html: Kindly note that it will be necessary for us to process your Personal Data, without which we will not be able to carry out the Purpose. For more details on how we process your Personal Data, do visit our Privacy Notice
form.term_condition_21_html: I am 18 years old and above, have read and understood the terms of the Privacy Notice and consent to the processing of my Personal Data as described above.
